Welcome to my app

This is a tutorial project on writing authorization and registration in JavaScript.

For authorization, you can click on the button "Correct data", and then on the button "Submit". If the login is successful, a green message will be shown, if an error is red. After authorization, information will come in the form of an object that can be viewed in the console. Some of this information is displayed at the bottom of the page in the News section. Namely the author, country, date and picture.

The second tab has a registration form. After filling in all the fields, a new user will be added. To confirm registration, a confirmation link will be sent to your e-mail. After registration, it becomes possible to enter this system using your data.

Technologies for the project: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap 4, JavaScript, Webpack.
